sec.div: Optical measurements on QDs at ensemble level
sec.p:
UV−Vis spectra were taken on an Agilent Technologies Cary 4000 UV−visible spectrophotometer. Steady-state and transient photoluminescence spectra were recorded on an Edinburgh Instruments FLS920 spectrometer. Transient photoluminescence spectra were measured via the time-correlated single-photon counting (TCSPC) method with a 405 nm picosecond laser diode with 2 MHz repetition rate.
